posts.text:
📌 Feed Works with keyword COMBOS ie:
[Book] + [Review] or
[Anyone Got] + [Movie Idea]

Attempts to pick up on reviews and suggestion requests for everything I can think of: Movies, Books, Games, Theatre, Albums etc. Ideally this will help people easily find ideas for new media to engage with.
posts.label: Neutral

posts.text:
3.5/5 stars. It's The Proposal but gay. Very fun. While essentially a roommates to lovers tale, Reyes isn't shying away from the horrors of immigration. Some minor pacing issues but overall a great romcom.

#thebroposal #bookreview
posts.label: Positive

posts.text:
Did you know that Bloodborne is one of my all time favorite games?? Right up there with Hollow Knight. BUT I'VE NEVER DRAWN FANART OF IT!

Thank you @wishingstarinajar.bsky.social for giving this suggestion. I am SO HAPPY with how this came out. Eileen is the most badass.

#bloodborne #eileenthecrow

posts.text:
this is why i love how danganronpa introduces mechanics

"sorry to interrupt, but this next bit is pretty complicated! if you played the old game, it's like that but way harder 😅 i think you'll like it once you get started, and remember that you can review at any time! okay have fun!!"

posts.text:
More #blue science (and more mysteries)…
Nice story by my colleague @spoke32.bsky.social on two new discoveries suggesting humans used blue pigments much earlier than thought.
Love to see all this research! At this rate I’ll have to revise my book soon :)) 💙
posts.label: Positive

posts.text:
#MusicChallenge 🎧 #REMtop30
2 - Country Feedback from Out Of Time (1991)
My 1 &2 picks are both equal faves
Loved this song from 1st listen & it's taken me to & from so many dark places. Mr Stipe always has the words🖤💙
"I was central
I had control
I lost my head
I need this"
youtu.be/6EHBh1FuY1Q?...
posts.label: Positive

posts.text: Susan Choi’s Flashlight is a good, interesting, deliberately frustrating novel about a Japanese-Korean-American woman who loses her father as a child and spends the rest of her life taking it out on her mother, elevated by an exceptionally moving and entirely earned final chapter. Recommended.
posts.label: Positive

The Ministry of Lost Things from @postcurious.bsky.social is back for Case 2: Finders Keypers! More puns, more beautiful artwork and even more puzzles to solve?! You won’t want to miss this one, which launches tomorrow on Kickstarter.

A full, spoiler-free review of the game is available now!

posts.text:
Saudis and Jared Kushner own EA now. This degrades the whole EA Games lineup for players. Investors don't care.

EA always gets huge criticism, often wrongfully, for a variety of thing, but this justfiably fuels more negative sentiment.
posts.label: Negative

posts.text:
Great story on BBC! 

To all those who are strongly against vaccines, we recommend reading Year of Wonders by Geraldine Brooks — a powerful novel about the plague in England in 1666.

#book #vaccine #UK
posts.label: Positive

posts.text:
Spilled my lemon iced drink all over the floor and took a long nap cause of mowing. Besides that, great night.

Watched Dandadan, The Summer Hikaru Died, Only Friends ep 3, summary of Fullmetal Alchemist first stage play, and Fullmetal Alchemist 2nd stage play.

All my thoughts later.(1/3)
posts.label: Positive
